title: Big5
body:
The 'Big Five for Life' concept encourages individuals to focus on their five most important life goals to lead a fulfilling and purpose-driven life.

1. **Pursuing my Private Pilot License (PPL(A))**: I am currently training for my PPL(A) at EDAQ Oppin near EDDP airport, transitioning from photography to aviation to explore the world from above.

2. **Relearning French to achieve fluency**: I am working on becoming fluent in French to enhance my cultural and professional opportunities.

3. **Visiting the mountains annually**: I prioritize annual mountain trips for hiking and reconnecting with nature, which is vital for my well-being.

4. **Starting my studies in IT Forensics**: In October 2024, I will begin studying IT Forensics at the University of Mittweida to deepen my knowledge in IT security and data breach investigation.

5. **Maintaining good mental health and well-being**: I focus on practices like mindfulness and exercise to ensure my mental health and overall well-being.

title: PPL(A)
body:
I am currently in the stage of doing my Private Pilot License (PPL(A)) and have already had some amazing lessons. My home base is EDAQ Oppin near EDDP airport.

I came to aviation via photography and no longer want to take pictures, so I decided to see the world not only through my lens but also from above.

title: Work
body:
In August 2021, I began my IT career at Deloitte Wirtschaftspr√ºfungsgesellschaft in Leipzig, Germany, as a trainee. By February 2024, I had gained extensive knowledge in network architecture, configuring Cisco hardware, and building cloud infrastructure.

After completing my apprenticeship at Deloitte, I continued with the company and transitioned to another project where I manage IT assets and ensure compliance with cybersecurity regulations.

In October 2024, I will start studying IT Forensics at the University of Mittweida, Germany, to deepen my understanding of IT security, data breaches, and related topics.
